notable_features: AWS Amplify for authentication and storage
Vite for fast development and optimized builds

echoes.POST /api/v1/echoes/init-upload: Initialize audio upload, get presigned S3 URL

upload_flow: 1. Call /echoes/init-upload to get presigned S3 URL
2. Upload audio file directly to S3 using presigned URL
3. Call /echoes to save echo metadata with S3 key

integration_notes: Backend CORS allows localhost:3000 for development
Vite proxy configured to forward /api and /health to backend
Frontend runs on port 3000, backend on port 8000
All API calls should use relative paths in frontend code

value.note: Using preview server due to vite dev server crypto.hash error
Backend service not started - frontend running independently on port 4173

Solution Coordinator findings: Large repository (1.1G) with 153.34 MiB pack size causing HTTP 400 error. 4 commits ahead, git garbage detected. Root cause: Push size exceeds server limits.

Prioritized solutions: 1. Git cleanup (high priority, immediate) 2. Large file detection and LFS (high priority, preventive) 3. Chunked pushing (medium priority, workaround) 4. Remote limits check (medium priority, diagnostic) 5. Alternative push methods (low priority, fallback)

indexOptimization: Consider periodic index rebuilding for optimal performance
